file_content.text: Is no good, Herald. We disable explosives, word comes in of dozen more.
Time is too close. We pull back now or fall to Imperial trap. Ship is dying.
Jedi, we've done our utmost, but we just found another stockpile of those bombs, and the timer's counting down.
There's simply too many. Either we pull back now, or we don't get out at all.
I'm sorry. I think the Javelin is lost.
Herald, have seen explosives droid spoke of. Voss commandos disable now.
Is dozens, all over starship systems. Have said to hurry.
Jedi, we reached the starboard cooling tanks. That droid wasn't lying--they're plastered with bombs.
I've told the others how to disable them safely, but it's a fiddly process. This will be a close-run thing.
We have silenced this Empire's whispering. The void is blank to them.
We wait for you, Sky Hunter.
We wait for you, Silent Teeth.
We wait for you, Ember Fist.
Our vessels are leaves on the wind, this Empire snatches in vain.
Our vessels court this Empire's lightning, as you ordered. Some are struck, but we trace the enemy's steps and grow wise.
Yet now they flee, Sky Hunter. Does this Empire have a newborn's heart?
Yet now they flee, Ember Fist. Does this Empire have a newborn's heart?
Yet now they flee, Silent Teeth. Does this Empire have a newborn's heart?
Voss and I taking weapons control and armory.
Soft things here fled before us. Is strangeness they did not fight. May you find better prey.
Armory's secure, but they locked the door to weapons control. We're cutting through.
Not to jinx it, but I expected stronger resistance than this. Might be a harder fight up ahead. Iresso out.
Hold on, Jedi. Security system's being stubborn.
Done. I'll watch for any more. Zenith out.
Oops. Let me get that force field for you.
All done! Tharan and I will keep an eye on the network room.
Commandos say force fields have dropped. Am destroying their generator.
Is done. Should be no more barriers for you, Herald.
Stand by. A crewman slipped past us and triggered a bunch of force fields.
Lousy Imperial fail-safes... there, you should be good to go. Iresso out.
Hang on, Jedi! Looks like they blocked your route, we're working on it.
Oh, there it goes. Take care.
Me and the commandos are at the network room. We'll see what we can do without Tharan and Holiday.
Then I'll hit security. Double-team them. Zenith out.
We spotted a security system, too. We'll go back for it later.
We're in the network room! Breaking Imperial coding... makes me all tingly.
Zenith sneaked off to security. I imagine he knows what to do with an Imperial security system. Ta-ta for now.
We'll have a crack at security too, if we get the chance. Ta-ta for now.
